channel.title: Corrections and ISO Updates to Non-Embedded Codelists
channel.description:
This topic is a heads up that the there are 5 planned changes to non-embedded code lists which are planned to be taken forwards if no objection is received within 7 days. In summary these are:
---------- **Corrections**
1. Correct the '2.01' URL in the Version codelist. 2. Remove duplicate entries from the File Format codelist. 3. Insert a missing comma in the Region Codelist.
Further information on each of these changes is available [here][1].
---------- **Updates**
1. Two currency name changes: Kuna & Romanian Leu 2. Multiple country name changes (see link below for details) 3. Effective date of Azerbaijanian Manat
Further information on each of these changes is available [here][2]
[1]: http://support.iatistandard.org/entries/82958805-Correct-typos-in-Non-Embedded-Codelists [2]: http://support.iatistandard.org/entries/82669649-ISO-4217-AMENDMENT-NUMBER-160
---------- With best wishes, Rory

item.title: Corrections and ISO Updates to Non-Embedded Codelists
item.dc:creator: rory_scott
item.description:
Hi Steven,

Thanks again for this - I’ve rolled out the changes to the live site. Please let me know if you see anything else!

Thanks,
Rory

Read full topic

item.title: Corrections and ISO Updates to Non-Embedded Codelists
item.dc:creator: rory_scott
item.description:
This topic is a heads up that the there are 5 planned changes to non-embedded code lists which are planned to be taken forwards if no objection is received within 7 days. In summary these are:

Corrections

  1. Correct the ‘2.01’ URL in the Version codelist.
  2. Remove duplicate entries from the File Format codelist.
  3. Insert a missing comma in the Region Codelist.

Further information on each of these changes is available here.

Updates

  1. Two currency name changes: Kuna & Romanian Leu
  2. Multiple country name changes (see link below for details)
  3. Effective date of Azerbaijanian Manat

Further information on each of these changes is available here

With best wishes,
Rory
